description: Enterprise techniques used by NanHaiShu, ATT&CK software S0228 v1.0
name: NanHaiShu (S0228)

techniques.comment: NanHaiShu can change Internet Explorer settings to reduce warnings about malware activity.[1]
NanHaiShu launches a script to delete their original decoy file to cover tracks.[2]
NanHaiShu uses mshta.exe to load its program and files.[2]
NanHaiShu modifies the %regrun% Registry to point itself to an autostart mechanism.[2]
NanHaiShu can download additional files from URLs.[1]
NanHaiShu executes additional Jscript and VBScript code on the victim's machine.[2]
NanHaiShu uses DNS for the C2 communications.[2]
NanHaiShu can gather the victim computer name and serial number.[1]
NanHaiShu can gather information about the victim proxy server.[1]
NanHaiShu collects the username from the victim.[2]
